entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Periods of light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
